sentences.en: By what external standard could you check its judgements?
sentences.cn: 你有什么外在标准可以衡量它的判断是否正确 呢 ?

sentences.en: Community leaders want to strengthen controls at external frontiers.
sentences.cn: 社区领导想要加强对小区外围的管理。

sentences.en: Do the BBC External Services adequately project Great Britain?
sentences.cn: 英国广播公司的海外广播部能使听众对英国有正确认识 吗 ?

sentences.en: External causes become operative through internal causes.
sentences.cn: 外因通过内因而起作用.

sentences.en: It is through our nervous system that we adapt ourselves to our environment and to all external stimuli.
sentences.cn: 我们是通过神经系统使自己适应环境及所有外部刺激的。

sentences.en: Riddled with a thousand gaping wounds , this reactionary clique is now beset with difficulties and contradictions both in internal and external affairs.
sentences.cn: 今天, 这个反动集团百孔千疮,内外交困,矛盾重重.

sentences.en: Riddled with a thousand gaping wounds, this reactionary clique is now beset with difficulties and contradictions both in internal and external affairs.
sentences.cn: 今天， 这个反动集团百孔千疮， 内外交困， 矛盾重重。

sentences.en: The accounts have to be audited by a firm of external auditors.
sentences.cn: 这些账目必须由一家外聘审计员的公司来稽查.

sentences.en: The database is fully hyperlinked both within the database and to thousands of external links.
sentences.cn: 该数据库在其内部以及和数千个外部链接之间充分实现了超链接。

sentences.en: The denser population necessitates closer consolidation both for internal and external action.
sentences.cn: 住得日益稠密的居民,对内和对外都不得不更紧密地团结起来.

sentences.en: The ear canal also named middle ear splays out at the external position.
sentences.cn: 耳道亦称中耳，内小外大呈喇叭状。

sentences.en: the external appearance of the building
The external auditors come in once a year.
sentences.cn: 外聘审计员每年来一次.

sentences.en: The external features of the building are very attractive.
sentences.cn: 这座建筑物的外观是很吸引人的.

sentences.en: The external layer of skin is called the epidermis.
the external walls of the building
The open cities will be testing grounds for our external policies.
sentences.cn: 使开放城市成为对外政策的窗口。

sentences.en: This antiseptic is for external use only.
Those things that can be assessed by external tests are being given unduly high status.
sentences.cn: 那些可以通过外部测试来评估的东西被过于重视了。

words.tran_cn: 走读生；走读医学研究生
给…以外形；使具体化，使客观化

phrases.tran_cn: 外在因素，外因；外来因素

trans.tran_cn: 外面的，外部的，外来的，与外国有关的
trans.tran_en: relating to the outside of something or of a person’s body
